txt.en: 'It's been overrun by goblins! Can you believe it? This used to be a quiet place to live.
'Ahaha! You did it! I saw my girls running for the hills.
After a very judgemental side eye, she trots away
With a stomp of her hooves, she charges off
She ponders biting you, but then hustles away
You have successfully driven off the cows of Ritherstad. You should let Varbris know his beloved girls are safe from goblins for the moment.\n\nVarbris is at Ritherstad.
She swishes her tail irritably at you, but runs off

Varbris has asked you to slap the rumps of his cows and shoo them away from the farm so that they might not fall prey to the goblins.\n\nYou should slap cow rumps at Ritherstad, in northern Pinnath Gelin.

'Igerna came through here a few days ago and hasn't returned. She headed off to Ritherstad, even though I tried to warn her that it's been overrun by goblins! Can you believe it? This used to be a quiet place to live.\n\n'I can see in your eyes that you're determined to follow after her. Like Igerna, you seem capable,
